FAQ.title: FAQ
FAQ.description: Below are some answers to common questions

questions.question: What is Easy SaaS Next?
questions.answer: Easy SaaS Next is a SaaS application framework based on Nextjs, helping developers build SaaS applications quickly.

Integrations.title: Using the most advanced technology stack
Integrations.description: Connect seamlessly with popular platforms and services to enhance your workflow.
Integrations.nextjs: Next.js is a React Framework for building full-stack web applications
Integrations.react: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces
Integrations.tailwind: Tailwind CSS is a CSS framework for building modern websites
Integrations.shadcn: shadcn/ui is a component library for building modern websites
Integrations.better-auth: better-auth is an authentication system for building modern websites
Integrations.postgresql: postgresql is an open source relational database management system
